message.raw:
Expanded ConnectionTable classes

 * Now made it simpler to add columns to the connection table while maintaining backwards compatibility by introducing a wrapping class to the HDF5 row. This wrapping class returns default values if the column does not exist in the connection table.
 * Added support for a "properties" column which will be a dictionary containing properties of the device that should be compared when checking for a valid subset.

  • Added support for a "properties" column which will be a dictionary containing properties of the device that should be compared when checking for a valid subset.
